page.title: 11CLUBS & SOCIETIES
page.content: For{ young children:} Toddlers & Play Group in Village Hall.{Older children: Church Coffee Club in Church Room (twice weekly: friendly meeting-place, indoor games , swimming ); Young Farmers' Club ( talks and discussions on farming topics, social events , regional competitions and farming skills ). {Adults:} Village Fellowship, Womens' Institute, & Horticultural Society meet monthly in Village Hall. Old Age Pensioners meet for company and whist. A Keep Fit group has recently been started. Burton Amblers walk local footpaths and nearby hills. At two {inns,} teams play darts, pool and dominoes.
